comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: This is the New York Seaplane Base (aka "Babylon Seaplane Base") located in the Dalton Point section of Babylon, Long Island, on Midway Street. See: Long Island Airports, by Joshua Stoff, Arcadia Publishing (2004), ISBN 0738536768, 9780738536767 books.google.com/books?id=ukaOiywl1b4C&pg=PA25&lp... This other photo in the SDASM photo stream was apparently taken at the same location and same time. [http://www.flickr.com/photos/sdasmarchives/6432986315/in/photostream/]
